creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, orange, blue, red; pounded indigo; lower half has three embroidered panels; diamonds and stylized flowers, esparated by red/white edging; upper helf all back with thin, cord ties; hand sewn; four thin lines of embroiderery at upper half
title: Skirt, from a three-piece set
